front.title: ASCE-NOAA leadership summit on climate-ready infrastructure

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: This document summarizes presentations and discussions from the February 2023 ASCE-NOAA Leadership Summit. It also presents key takeaways from the Summit for NIST to consider in advancing community resilience planning and assessment through community user guidance, particularly via updates to NIST’s Community Resilience Program published the Community Resilience Planning Guide (CRPG).
